name: Tracer Twin Black Clog Free Marker set
desc: TWIN PACK COMBO: Includes 2x 2–4mm thick bullet point permanent construction markers—perfect for both detailed and bold all-surface construction marking., CLOG-FREE: Clog-free design ensures reliable ink flow on dusty, dirty, oily and shiny surfaces—ideal for tough job site conditions where standard markers often fail., ALL-SURFACE MARKING: Marks on timber, metal, tile, glass, concrete, brick, and plastic—built for versatility across every common construction material., SAFE & PERMANENT: Permanent black ink is xylene- and toluene-free, so the markers are safe to use on site and delivers long-lasting, fade-resistant marks., BOLD VISIBILITY: The 2–4mm thick bullet tip ensures precise, high-contrast lines that are easy to see in low light environments, even from a distance.

name: TRACER Rafter Square Holster
desc: Compact square tool holster, perfect for any tradesperson., Aluminium construction, built for the perils of the worksite., Simple and convenient one-handed operation., Designed to equip most common tape measures with built in belt clips., Additional storage slots for TRACER Construction Markers and more., Able to hold most common Square Tools up to 150mm / 7’’ in size.

name: TRACER Pro (Metal) Tough Pencil and 5.6mm lead set
desc: Heavy-Duty Aluminium Construction: Built to withstand demanding job site conditions, ensuring long-lasting durability and reliability for professional trade applications., Built-In Pencil Sharpener: Always maintain a precise, sharp pencil point for clean, accurate marks without the hassle of searching for a separate sharpener., Anti-Roll Pencil Design: Prevents the construction pencil from rolling away, keeping your tool within easy reach and minimizing job site interruptions., Premium Anti-Snap Lead Dispenser: Safely stores 4 tough graphite leads and 2 red high-visibility leads for versatile and reliable marking on various surfaces., High-Visibility Red Leads: Perfect for marking on dark surfaces, providing clear, highly visible red lead lines on a variety of wet or dry construction surfaces, TRACER Pencil Holster: Includes a built-in trouser or shirt clip, ensuring secure and instant access to your pencil at all times., Precision Round Leads: Deliver clean and accurate markings, ideal for professional applications across wood, plastic, metal, tile, concrete, and bricks.

name: TRACER 2.0 Chisel Tip Permanent Marker  - 36pc Black (ECOM)

desc: BUILT FOR TRACER PENCILS: Designed to fit the TRACER Deep Hole Construction Pencil perfectly for seamless use in welding and metal fabrication projects., MARKS ON ALL METAL SURFACES: Marks clearly on oily, wet, and rusty metals where traditional pencil leads and markers fail. For highly visible lead pencil marking., REFLECTIVE MARKING: Reflective marks of these silver welders leads stay visible even during cutting, grinding, or welding—ideal for all metal fabrication work., HEAT RESISTANT: Withstands extremely high temperatures—marks won’t burn off, rub away, or get blown off under heat of professional welding applications., NO SCRATCHING: Marks without scratching or damaging metal surfaces, ensuring cleaner, more professional welding results and reducing unnecessary damage., ANTI-SNAP CASE: Supplied in a robust anti-snap holster with trouser clip—keeps leads safe and accessible on site., PACK OF SIX: Includes 6x 2.8mm silver leads, offering long-lasting use for welding, fabrication, and high-temperature applications.

All contained in a high quality carry case.

name: TRACER Fluorescent Highlighter Kit (Green, Yellow, Pink) (plastic free)
desc: Bright, High-Visibility Ink – Fluorescent yellow, pink, and green ink stands out on documents and plans, making key details easy to spot at a glance in any lighting conditions., 2-4mm Chisel Tip for Precision – Versatile chisel tip allows for both broad highlighting and fine underlining, giving you full control over how you mark up your documents., Fast-Drying & Fade-Resistant – Quick-drying ink prevents smudging on paper, while the fade-resistant formula ensures long-lasting visibility for important project details., Ergonomic Design for Comfort – Designed for extended use, the highlighter’s ergonomic shape provides a comfortable grip, reducing hand fatigue on long projects., Secure Site Holster for Accessibility – Each highlighter includes a site holster that clips securely to pockets or tool belts, keeping your markers within easy reach at all times.
